default.name: Default
default.command: -f video4linux2 -framerate 25 -g 50 -video_size vga -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -ar 44100 -b:a 128k -acodec libmp3lame -vcodec libx264 -crf 23 -tune zerolatency -f flv

yt.name: Default
yt.command: -f video4linux2 -framerate 15 -video_size qvga -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -ar 44100 -b:a 128k -acodec libmp3lame -f flv -vcodec libx264 -crf 23 -tune zerolatency

yt2.name: Default
yt2.command: -f video4linux2 -framerate 15 -video_size qvga -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -ar 44100 -b:a 128k -acodec libmp3lame -vcodec libx264 -crf 23 -tune zerolatency -f flv

low.name: Low Quality
low.command: -f video4linux2 -framerate 10 -video_size qvga -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i default:CARD=U0x46d0x825 -ar 44100 -b:a 128k -acodec libmp3lame -f flv -vcodec libx264 -crf 24 -profile baseline -preset ultrafast -tune zerolatency

high.name: High Quality
high.command: -f video4linux2 -framerate 30 -g 60 -video_size hd720 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -ar 44100 -b:a 128 k -acodec libmp3lame -f flv -vcodec libx264 -crf 19 -preset slow -tune zerolatency

test.name: Local Test
test.command: -f video4linux2 -framerate 30 -g 60 -video_size hd720 -i /dev/video0 -f alsa -i pulse -ar 44100 -b:a 128 k -acodec libmp3lame -f flv -vcodec libx264 -crf 19 -preset slow -tune zerolatency

testNoSound.name: No Sound Test
testNoSound.command: -f video4linux2 -framerate 30 -g 60 -video_size hd720 -i /dev/video0 -an -f flv -vcodec libx264 -crf 19 -preset slow -tune zerolatency
